column4: excuse me, I'm trying to umount a hard drive and umount complains that it's busy. How can I find out what's blocking it?
did you try with the -c option? fuser -c /mount/point
it's an ntfs if that helps at all
Might be fuser doesn't work properly with NTFS. Do you have any terminal windows open where you've cd'ed into that filesystem?
no, not at all but it doesn't matter
